name: unichat

scripts.build-js: browserify -t coffeeify -t [ reactify --extension coffee ] app/main.coffee | uglifyjs -mc > public/js/bundle.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify -t coffeeify -t [ reactify --extension coffee ] --debug app/main.coffee -o public/js/bundle.js -dv
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css

author: Petri Avikainen, Valtteri Virtanen and Atte Moisio
